Room.Name: Uland's Long Dock End
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the end of a long dock, often home to the pirate ship Widow Maker.
Room.LongDescription: The Widow Maker sometimes moors here at the end of the dock for a few days, making Uland Island her home port while she waits for the weather to change. This is a deepwater dock, meant for large ships. Merchant ships also tie up here, but seldom when the Widow Maker is in port. A tangy smell of salt air and decaying fish is in the air. Several fishermen are on the dock today.
